subject: Order #SSN5825
description_text:
Hello my order is going to the wring address the address is listed as 710
E. 10th ave. That is NOT correct. It should be 721 E  10th ave Munhall pa
15120. Please let me know ASAP . Thank you.

conversations.body_text: Good morning,        My order # SSN5825 (Pro X Ultra Pedals) is still unfullfilled after 13 days at your facility. I do see that you made the correct address change (thank you) and as of the 14th my other order( Shifter) is on its way. Could you please look in to this. I really don't want to have to cancel the order with my CC company. I appreciate the concept of your company would like to continue my support.   Thank you.
